newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Prudential on Sallie Mae.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Prudential on Sallie Mae.

text.p: Prudential Securities analyst Jonathan Adams confirmed he raised his rating on Student Loan Marketing Association (Sallie Mae) to buy from hold.
-- cited U.S. Department of Education decision last week that a 30 basis point offset fee did not apply to certain student loans securitized by Sallie Mae.
-- said believes the Committee to Restore Value (CRV), a group opposing managment of Sallie Mae, will win its proxy battle on Thursday.
-- said CRV is taking a "little bit less of a strident stand" with regard to loan origination.
